alert.note: Alert for Morris; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 10:15AM EST until January 25 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow is expected. Total snow accumulations up to 1 to 3 inches, with the greatest amounts in the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...The New Jersey counties of Warren and Morris, and Northampton County in Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 4:00 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Expect slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could briefly exceed one inch per hour this afternoon. The snow will change to a wintry mix, then to all rain by late afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extra caution if traveling. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
